heading: Today
text: A period of showers lifting northeast this morning and diminishing, with more rain and showers this afternoon, possibly a thunderstorm south.  Highs in the 60s to low 70s.  Winds becoming southeast 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley, up to 30 mph over the higher terrain.

heading: Tonight
text: Showers, a localized thunderstorm this evening, tapering off southwest to northeast.  Some breaks in the clouds late.  Lows in the 50s.  Winds southeast near 10 mph, becoming light and turning to the west late.

heading: Friday
text: Morning clouds breaking for periods of sun.  A chance of a few localized showers, especially over the higher terrain.  Highs in the upper 60s to mid 70s.  Winds becoming west to northwest near 10 mph.
